name: Dranker
description:
Events of Dranker unfolds in industrial age of 19th century, where player becoming a local hilly-billy and regular guest at least, somewhat famous pubs of London. But, in one day he practically getting captured by the policemen of the city and starts running trough the streets to find his home. Game possesses wide visual style with a lot of details that contain the main features of the atmosphere of 19th century in London. Mud everywhere, stylish constables, local pubs, etc. It is necessary to jump over obstacles with a space bar and dodge bolts. People with alcohol addiction are not recommended to spend a long time playing alone. Escaped criminals are also concerned!

Russia has three ways, raves, vodka and IT
